turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order but the tracking number isn't working. I'm getting really frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Please provide your order number, and I'll check the status for you.  Could you also confirm the shipping carrier listed on your order confirmation?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the order number is #12345 and the carrier is UPS.  I even tried entering it on the UPS website and it said it's invalid!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've checked the order and the tracking information. It appears the package was picked up by UPS on Tuesday and is currently in transit. The tracking number should be: 1Z999AA1234567890. Please allow 24 hours for the tracking information to update on the UPS website. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Wait a second... I *thought* I ordered express shipping. The original order confirmation email doesn't specify the shipping speed. Can you check if I paid for express shipping, and if not, why I wasn't offered it as an option?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am able to see the details of your order. Unfortunately, I am not able to determine *why* the express shipping wasn't offered at the time of your purchase. I can see that standard shipping was selected. To understand this, I would recommend contacting a customer service representative. I can connect you immediately if you like.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please connect me to a customer service rep. Thanks.
